data.text: @BootlegLady @AllegiantStadm @BTS_twt Do you know if it's membership first then regular people on Thursday or is everyone today to get tickets ??

@BootlegLady @AllegiantStadm @BTS_twt Obviously being vaccinated will make you less likely to end up dead and having a negative test might prevent a widespread cluster infection but, as we have seen with many, many kpop idols, this really is useless. People will still be infected by those unknowingly infected.

@BootlegLady @Jeronnamoe @AllegiantStadm @BTS_twt BETTER than NV's or Allegiant Stadium's COVID protocols:
• NV - Lifted masking statewide.
• Allegiant Stadium - Requires ages 12+ for proof of vax, but no masks  req'd for fully vaxxed.

ARMY, no matter what, let's protect #BTS & ourselves &  stay masked during event. @BTS_twt
